title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
earch for survivors.

This event is triggered as you approach Waukeem's Rest. There is a burning inn ahead.Enter the burning inn and see if there are any survivors. Help Gauntlet Yeva push the doors to get through the wreckage into the burning building. If you do this successfully, you can search the area for survivors.

As you enter the burning inn, you should be able to encounter and save Counsellor Florrick. She's trapped beyond a broken door at Waukeen's rest, The Risen Road. You'll find Cou
